channel.title: Barrage Help
channel.description:
Hey guys, I'm using Czar base. And the barrage takes to long to barrage again. I'm thinking to make it faster is [code]PkingDelay = 15;[/code] If it is, please post. If its not, please tell me how to make it faster? By the way I'm talking about the barrage timer. To barrage again. Taking to long.
Thx.

item.title: Barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

the person that casts the spell wont be able to move? or the one that got barraged?

Read full topic

well the freeze delay is like waht 15 secs

yet it casts a spell every 7 so the person wont be abel to move

item.title: Barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @runormal runormal
item.description:
@runormal wrote:

Oh trust me i know whats wrong

Let me make a tut on the whole thing

go to client java

search for something liek this

if(!nonWild() && !pl2.nonWild() && pcombat != -1) {
if(mageTimer <= 0) {
AttackMage(playerIndexx);
mageTimer = 20;

change the 20 to 7 but then u have to make barrages not re freeze

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Find:


Public boolean process

Delete that.

Lulz, don’t really do that. Check out your methods, as some might have delays on them.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrage Help
item.dc:creator: @xx_Santa_pker_xX xx Santa pker xX
item.description:
@xx_Santa_pker_xX wrote:

Thx but im a bit confused…
Heres the NPC Barrage code.

if(magicID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 4)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 2)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 6)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); setAnimation(1979); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].PoisonPlayer(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].uberentangle(); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((800*playerLevel[6]), 6); //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); //sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 4); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 2); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 6); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

And heres the Wild Barrage Code

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] > 93) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 40 "+getItemName(560)+", 40 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 60 "+getItemName(554)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 40)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 60)==true)) { hitDiff = 5 + misc.random(25); startAnimation(1979); castOnPlayer.PoisonPlayer(); castOnPlayer.uberentangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); //castOnPlayer.stillgfx(387, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You poison and freeze the enemy!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 40); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 40); deleteItem(554, getItemSlot(554), 60); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 124) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 125 to cast this spell."); } }

Notice how the wild one doesn’t have a pk delay?

Read full topic
